channel.description: Recent content in Abundance on ceedon.io

item.title: Morning
item.description: This won’t be literary gold, but I’m writing it down. Something about morning makes it easier to do so. Maybe it’s that I haven’t had time to spend too much time inside my head since returning from the clouds of dream. Note to self: check w/ Morpheus. Early morning and late night share so much. The ones I’m speaking to are quiet, solitary things—free from the myriad stimulae of life—when you are left alone to ponder.
